channel.title: Business Features on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Business Features on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Mickey vs. Shrek: Inside the Multibillion-Dollar Theme Park War
item.description: From Orlando to Abu Dhabi, Disney and Comcast are pouring tens of billions of dollars — and their best IP — in a bid to own the future of experiential entertainment.

item.title: Mickey vs. Shrek: Inside the Multibillion-Dollar Theme Park War
item.description: From Orlando to Abu Dhabi, Disney and Comcast are pouring tens of billions of dollars — and their best IP — in a bid to own the future of experiential entertainment.
